title: Remove all obsolete/compatibility types in mono/skia
body:
**Description**

Over the years, we have added compatibility APIs into the native library, and these need to be reviewed:

- [x] ~`SkCompatPaint`~ _(it was not obsolete)_
- [x] `SkColorTable`
- [x] `SkXMLWriter`
- [x] `SkMask`
- [ ] do a diff and see what was added
